    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_cc3d30e13795907f8c5885a9cac123cd8b75af76</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_cc3d30e13795907f8c5885a9cac123cd8b75af76</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Period of a wave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode einer Welle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Période d'une vague</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Período de uma onda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodo di un'onda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίοδος κύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Período de una onda</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows that the period T of a sine wave is equivalent to the time it takes for one complete wave to pass a point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sine wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt, daß die Periode T einer 
Sinuswelle mit der Zeit gleichwertig ist, die sie nimmt, damit eine 
komplette Welle einen Punkt führt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure prouve que la période T d'une vague de
sinus est équivalente au temps où elle prend pour qu'une vague 
complète passe un point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra que o período T de uma onda do 
seno é equivalente ao tempo onde faça exame para que uma onda 
completa passe um ponto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura indica che il periodo T di un'onda di 
seno è equivalente al tempo che prende affinchè un'onda completa 
passi un punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός δείχνει ότι η περίοδος τ ενός κύματος 
ημιτόνου είναι ισοδύναμη με το χρόνο που παίρνει για ένα πλήρες
κύμα για να περάσει ένα σημείο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra que el período T de una onda 
del seno es equivalente al tiempo que toma para que una onda completa 
pase una punta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinuswelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague de sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">période</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda do seno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">período</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda del seno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
